title: Convenience shopping in the free-sale component shall be permitted along the layout roads
clause_text: Convenience shopping in the free-sale component shall be permitted along the layout roads. The CEO, SRA may add to alter or amend the said list for convenience shopping.
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
